basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.name: James Ward
basics.summary:
I am an Engineer through and through - I solve practical problems. I get things done, ship amazing software, and create a superb user experience.  Unit tests, end to end testing, and test driven development are my go-to tools for crafting solid products.
This isn't just a day job to me, it's a passion.

highlights: Pre-Seed Technical Co-Founder - wrote the proof of concept and then lead development of the alpha product release.
Create React Native & React Native Web frontend for the user and end-user portions of the flagship community product utilizing React Hooks and CSS-in-JS.
Built NodeJS backend APIs and infrastructure to support rapid product feature iteration, rolling atomic deployments, as well as the ability to scale from 100 members to 100,000.
Develop cross-functional initiatives to improve data flow between products to encourage a migration towards distributed architecture.
Provide technical leadership to bring service reliability from 90% to 99.999% - from 73 hours to less than 30 seconds of downtime per month - improving the experience for over 40 million users.
Coordinate multiple D&I recruiting initiatives to improve representation of traditionally underrepresented groups in hiring pipelines.
Built the Hivemind deception and threat intelligence platform using Node, Kafka, Tensorflow, Postgres, and ElasticSearch to support real-time personalization encouraging intruders.
Designed the customer narratives, workflows, and user experience of the Hivemind platform using design partner feedback and user testing.
Assisted both domestic and international law enforcement agencies on cybercrime cases, leading to the discontinuation of malicious activity against tens of thousands of victims.
Architect a cross-team platform that generates over 18% of company revenue by enabling open communication with millions of active customers.
Utilized Kafka, Storm, and HBase to apply user defined rules to billions of events per day enabling marketing to build real-time engaging experiences for every Wayfair customer.
Create tooling for NOC automation and Denial of Service mitigation.
Wrote end-to-end and unit tests to reduce breakage during refactors and feature iteration.
Optimized web stack on application servers, reducing infrastructure costs.
Integrated the product with several third-party SOAP and REST APIs.
